definitions.definition: Three times or thrice the number, amount, size, etc
A drink with three portions of alcohol.
definitions.example: I've had a hard day; make that a triple.
I'd like a triple with cheese.
The shortstop hit a triple to lead off the ninth.

definitions.definition: A takeout shot in which three stones are removed from play.
A sequence of three elements or 3-tuple.

definitions.example: The company tripled their earnings per share over last quarter.
The batter tripled into the gap.

definitions.definition: To become three times as large
definitions.example: Our earnings have tripled in the last year.

definitions.definition: To serve or operate as (something), in addition to two other functions.
Made up of three related elements, often matching
definitions.example: The triple markings on this vase are quite unique.
Give me a triple serving of mashed potatoes.

definitions.definition: Folded in three; composed of three layers.
Of time, three times as fast as very fast.
